longDescription: During major online sales events, finding the best tech deals in real-time is a significant challenge, as prices fluctuate and top offers sell out quickly. Tech Expert is a smart Telegram bot that acts as a personal deal-hunter to solve this. It actively monitors major e-commerce sites like Amazon and Flipkart using web scraping techniques. When a significant discount on a gadget is found, it immediately sends a notification to the user with a direct link to the product, helping them make timely and informed purchasing decisions and saving them money.
